definitions.definition: A large settlement, bigger than a town; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
definitions.example: São Paulo is the largest city in South America.

definitions.definition: A settlement granted special status by royal charter or letters patent; traditionally, a settlement with a cathedral regardless of size.

definitions.example: I'm going into the city today to do some shopping.

definitions.definition: A large amount of something (used after the noun).
definitions.example: It's video game city in here!
